The Economics of Happiness

part of Transition Kentish Town's film season

As part of their Spring Film Season, Transition Kentish Town are showing The Economics of Happiness at Annie’s Bar.

A powerful new film about how ‘going local’ is a powerful strategy to repair our fractured world: our ecosystems, our societies and our selves.

All film showings are in the downstairs room at Annie’s Bar, 180 Kentish Town Road, NW5 2AE.

These are relaxed occasions and they usually have a friendly discussion afterwards. A £2 donation is requested.
